name: BuildpacksInstaller
description: Find in cache or download a specific version of Buildpacks and prepend it to the PATH
author: Andrew Broekman

inputs.name: buildpacksVersion
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of Buildpacks which should be installed on the agent if not already present

outputVariables.name: buildpacksLocation
outputVariables.description: The location of the buildpacks binary that was installed on the agent.

messages.InputVersionNotValidSemanticVersion: Input version %s is not a valid semantic version
messages.BuildpacksNotFoundInFolder: Buildpacks executable not found in path %s
messages.BuildpacksDownloadFailed: Failed to download Buildpacks from url %s. Error %s
